Container.Name: ACEmulator
Container.Changes:
[center][img width='155px' src='https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/24881359?s=200'][/center]
[center][font size=4]ACEmulator Change Log[/font][/center]
[font size=3]2020.01.30[/font] - Initial Release
Container.Description: Welcome to ACEmulator, an open source server emulator and support toolset for the M.M.O.R.P.G. Asheron's Call rebuilt from the ground up, by the community, following the game world shutdown on January 31st, 2017. [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/ace/Config[/b] : path for Configuration files [b]/ace/Content[/b] : path for Content files [b]/ace/Dats[/b] : path for the DAT-Files [b]/ace/Logs[/b] : path for log files
